org.criteria4jpa.projection
Interface Projection

All Known Implementing Classes:
CountProjection, DistinctProjection, FunctionProjection, PathProjection, ProjectionList, RootEntityProjection
public interface Projection

Interface describing a projection that can be added to a Criteria.

The Projection is rendered to the SELECT expression in the generated JPQL query and may be added to a Criteria by calling Criteria.setProjection(Projection).

You should use the static factory methods of Projections to obtain predefined projections.

Author:
Christian Kaltepoth

Method Summary
 String toQueryString(Criteria criteria, CriteriaQueryBuilder queryBuilder)
          Renders the Projection to the SELECT expression of the JPQL query.
 

Method Detail

toQueryString

String toQueryString(Criteria criteria,
                     CriteriaQueryBuilder queryBuilder)
Renders the Projection to the SELECT expression of the JPQL query.

Parameters:
criteria - The criteria this projection was added to
queryBuilder - The query builder that is currently building the query
Returns:
The JPQL SELECT expression
